snippet.title: Episode 132: Ian Hutton of Symbian on the Foundation's roadm
snippet.description:
Episode 132: Ian Hutton of Symbian on the Foundation's roadm
Toegevoegd door mobiledevelopertv 4 jaren geleden
Ian Hutton heads up Technology Management at the Symbian Foundation and is also the chair of Symbian's Feature and Roadmap Council. We sat down with him to find out more about what we should expect from the Foundation in the future.
18 views

snippet.title: 40GigOpticalNetworking102308
snippet.description:
40GigOpticalNetworking102308
Toegevoegd door inspirethenewlife06 5 jaren geleden
Join Kim Papakos, Tellabs Senior Product Manager as he explains what is driving the need for 40-Gig, explore the technology behind 100-Gig and learn how network providers can save money with 40-Gig interfaces.
34 views

snippet.title: Tellabs Get Schooled: Dynamic Optical Networks
snippet.description:
Tellabs Get Schooled: Dynamic Optical Networks
Toegevoegd door inspirethenewlife06 5 jaren geleden
Rapid growth in end-user high bandwidth demands is helping to evolve today's metro networks. This episode of Get Schooled features Bert Buescher, Group Product Manager, explores how end-user high-bandwidth demands will affect service carriers as they plan and build out their optical networks.
27 views

snippet.title: Tellabs Get Schooled Podcast: Optical Transport Evolution: K
snippet.description:
Tellabs Get Schooled Podcast: Optical Transport Evolution: K
Toegevoegd door inspirethenewlife06 6 jaren geleden
Featuring Kim Papakos, Senior Product Manager. Explore the difference between single and multi-degree ROADM technology and learn how the increase in IPTV deployments is significantly increasing the demand for DWDM bandwidth.
158 views
